commandDefinition.name: Send email Reports
commandDefinition.command:
param ( [parameter(Mandatory=$true, HelpMessage="SMTP server for sending the email item")] [string]$SmtpHost, [parameter(Mandatory=$true, HelpMessage="Recipient's SMTP email address")] [string]$To, [parameter(Mandatory=$true, HelpMessage="From field's SMTP email address")] [string]$From ) $attachment1="c:\Aggregate_Report.html" $attachment2="c:\Volume_Report.html" $attachment3="c:\Aggr_Vol_Report.html" $Subject = "Volumes and Aggregates usage %" $Body = "Hi,

Please find attached the list of aggregates and volumes that are more than threshold% .
Please address the volumes that reside on aggregates that are more than 80% utilized
immediately.

regards,
WFA Team.

" Get-WFALogger -Info -message $("Sending email to " + $To) Send-MailMessage -From $From -to $To -Subject $Subject -Body $Body -SmtpServer $SmtpHost -Attachments $attachment1,$attachment2,$attachment3 -BodyAsHtml
commandDefinition.description: Sends all reports as attachments through email to a particular user The email will be sent via a designated SMTP server (not necessarily the one used for WFA notifications) .

parameter-definition.description: SMTP server for sending the email item
parameter-definition.name: SmtpHost
